languages.text: Nazrakhei shoots, dealing <u>(from 12 to 52)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}. Everyone around the target and the target themselves suffer a −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} unless they pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
languages.original_text: Назракей стреляет, нанося <u>(от 12 до 52)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g}. Цель и все, кто находится рядом, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и −1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}.

languages.text: Nazrakhei dispara, infligiendo <u>12-52</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}daño perforante{/g}. Todo el que esté junto al objetivo y el objetivo en sí sufren un −10 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y −1 a su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} salvo que supere una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.

Everyone around the target and the target themselves suffer a −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} unless they pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nazrakhei dispara, infligiendo <u>12-52</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}daño perforante{/g}. Todo el que esté junto al objetivo y el objetivo en sí sufren un −10 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y −1 a su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} salvo que supere una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.

languages.text: 纳札骸设计目标，造成<u>（12到52点）</u>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则目标周围所有目标与目标自身获得−10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与-1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
languages.original_text: Nazrakhei shoots, dealing <u>(from 12 to 52)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}. Everyone around the target and the target themselves suffer a −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} unless they pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 纳札骸设计目标，造成<u>（12到52点）</u>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则目标周围所有目标与目标自身获得-10%{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}与-1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

纳札骸设计目标，造成<u>（12到52点）</u>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则目标周围所有目标与目标自身获得−10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与-1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

languages.text: Nazrakhei tire, ce qui inflige <u>(de 12 à 52)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g}. Tous les personnages présents autour de la cible et la cible elle-même subissent une pénalité de −10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et −1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, sauf s'ils réussissent un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Nazrakhei shoots, dealing <u>(from 12 to 52)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}. Everyone around the target and the target themselves suffer a −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} unless they pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nazrakhei tire, ce qui inflige <u>(de 12 à 52)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}dégâts perçants{/g}. Tous les personnages présents autour de la cible ainsi que la cible elle-même subissent une pénalité de -10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et -1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, sauf s'ils réussissent un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}.

languages.text: Nazrakhei verursacht <u>(12 bis 52)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Durchdringungsschaden{/g}. Das Ziel selbst und alle umstehenden Kreaturen haben −10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}, wenn ihre {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} misslingt.
languages.original_text: Nazrakhei shoots, dealing <u>(from 12 to 52)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}. Everyone around the target and the target themselves suffer a −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} unless they pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nazrakhei schießt und fügt <u>(von 12 bis 52)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Durchdringungsschaden{/g} zu. Jeder um das Ziel und das Ziel selbst erleiden −10 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}, es sei denn, eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} wird bestanden.

languages.text: ナズラクヘイが撃つと、{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}貫通ダメージ{/g}を<u>(12から52の間)</u>与える。ターゲットの周囲の全員およびターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} −10%、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g} −1となる。

Everyone around the target and the target themselves suffer a −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} unless they pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ナズラクヘイが撃つと、{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}貫通ダメージ{/g}を<u>(12から52の間)</u>与える。ターゲットの周囲の全員およびターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g} −10%、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} −1となる。
